entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse Trump is a failed leader that caused 115,000 deaths, including 1400+ Veterans, 36 active duty and over 100+ cops. Went golfing and rallies for months and ignored warnings to test, trace and isolate coronavirus cases.

#FireTrump https://t.co/dzpFZ2qf9B
